Ok. I'm board

Assuming bored, and why?

Assuming bored, and why?

derp

I have no inspiration for KSP right now. No new KSP videos. Only thing good on TV is Duck Dynasty (guess I can't complain there). Nobody is having any conversations on the forums.

derp

I have no inspiration for KSP right now. No new KSP videos. Only thing good on TV is Duck Dynasty (guess I can't complain there). Nobody is having any conversations on the forums.

I'd be on the forums a lot more... but school and certain ship designs keep hoovering up my free time. However, I do have a new ship for tomorrow, based off of daemon' s wonderful immersive cockpit design.

Also, I can't wait for that B9 battlestar cinematic to be released! I wanna see how well the Corona-class does in anti-B9 combat.

Edit: Here's a pic of that ship, which'll be uploaded if I have time tomorrow.

That's the perfect sound to watch your home planet burn form orbit.

Rune. Dude, how many hours did I lose with those games. So pretty!

Ok so I got new stuff but I want to know what y'all think of them before I add them to my huge supply of crafts.

On the far left and right are sentry drones.

The one on the far left is a MK I model and has only 1 50. cal gun

The one on the far right is a MK II Model and has twin 50 cal guns and two missiles

(both are using the BD armory mod and crawler critter mod (made by the same guy who made BD)

The two vehicles in the middle I call Scorpions

The one on the right is the MK I (yes it has a laser and yes I know you don't want lasers but I forgot about that when I made so why waste a good vehicle right. Heck the worst you can say is no)

The one on the left is the MK II model and has a 105mm howitzer instead of a laser.

http://www./view/42j0bg3c7vmpegp/Sentry_Droid.craft

http://www./view/782oxk467ph8bix/Sentry_Droid_MK2.craft

http://www./view/9ggk9kpxk13bp8e/Scorpion.craft

http://www./view/g89paavjuc84vbl/Scorpion_MKII.craft

I am also working on a new fighter to act as a rival to the arrowblade. I ll post that after testing is done

Edited September 9, 2014 by War Eagle 1

Update: Added the MU SX-7 Scoutcraft to the DL Folder and album.

WARNING: Slightly-high partcount (for the size of the ship) due to lots of stock-part missiles, a thick hull, and a fully detailed bridge/sleeping area.

Man this thread has been quiet the past few days.

On a side not....that rival fighter I was talking about.... Yeah that turned in to a fighter/bomber. So it will be drafted into my personal arsenal. Basically it moved the arrowblade from multirole to full fledged fighter status .

I will revile the PG-27 Temple soon

I think it's been quiet because HatBat is filming.

Correct :3

Unfortunately I'm still waiting on Mission Controller to make the finishing touches to the scene before I can film the next part, but I really can't blame him, it was really great of him to donate his time to helping me out. However I guess it's back in my hands now that I have the time to do it myself; It might add a day or so to production but I can't see it causing too much of a problem.

Ok, cool. I've just been in a sort of random all-stock building spree, but I'll probably make a new atmospheric fighter using BDArmory now that I understand it pretty well. That, and a replica of this:

(It'll be SSTO capable, somehow. )

Ok here she is.

The latest aircraft in the Project Genesis aerial arsenal.

The PG-24 Arrowblade made a good multirole its true purpose has always air-to-air combat.

So our top engineers (Me) started looking for a way to better fit the air-to-ground role.

If the Arrowblade is like an F-16C, then this new beauty is like an F-15E

For your consideration

The PG-27 Temple

This fighter/bomber has many features that the arrowblade has such as VTOL/STOVL capabilities but after much testing it is found to be more stable than the PG-24 but slightly less maneuverable. However that high stability is perfect for ground attack.

The PG-27 can be considered an OVERKILL aircraft due to the mass amount of fire power it is capable of having. The picture above is just an example of the vast capabilities this aircraft has.

Now granted it can be used as an air-to-air fighter, this role would be much more suited to the PG-24 due it the laters higher maneuverability. Nether the less the PG-27 is ready, willing, and able to undertake any task thrown at it.

I will post a link to download after BD Armory is updated

Ok, cool. I've just been in a sort of random all-stock building spree, but I'll probably make a new atmospheric fighter using BDArmory now that I understand it pretty well.

I would love to see it when done. I am really considering trying out DMP and having a dogfight with someone

Hi Hatbat and all

I Have a late entry to this war. If you'll have her.

ChrisCorp Aircraft Carrier 2 (The Laythe AC / Mobile Base ) armed and ready.

At ChirsCorp we firmly believe in idiot testing craft and we have the best idiots around

ChrisCorp has no allegiance except to our share holders and therefore wish the 2 parties well in there endeavors and look forward to the arms race that follows.

AC2 has been tested in all Laythe conditions. With is catamaran design it remains stable in all weather, its sturdy construction means it can remain mobile after taking damage from multiple hits (warning warranty void in acts of war).

The AC2 comes loaded with accessories such as dual rovers for conducting land Scouting or Science missions, fast 2 man scout boats(150m/s+top speed)

Docking is simple and easy with 2 medium well placed ports either at the rear deck for small to medium SSTO's, 6 on deck small ports for fighters / rovers, 2 small below deck for scout boats and 1 medium.

ChrisCorp also offers a rage of sub orbital craft to further outfit the AC2 ranging from VTOL Scouts to fighters.

All are available with prices that will shock you

We hope the lucky side that buys the AC2 will enjoy an added wartime bonus, for a limited times the AC2 comes with 6 tommawk cruise missiles, duel aft and stern rockets and short range missiles.

And remember when you think explosions of doom think ChrisCorp.

VAB Config - Laythe AC2

SPH Config - Laythe AC2 (The SPH config allows for hyperedit making it an easy video process )

VTOL Fighters and fast boats

Edited September 10, 2014 by KandoKris
